snippet: The Hudson Project, promising more than 85 musical acts, will make its debut this year from July 11 through 13, and will be held at the Winston Farm in Saugerties, N.Y.,
abstract: The Hudson Project, promising more than 85 musical acts, will make its debut this year from July 11 through 13, and will be held at the Winston Farm in Saugerties, N.Y.,

headline.main: 45 Years After Woodstock, New Hudson River Festival Is Announced
headline.print_headline: Not Yasgur’s Farm, But Not Very Far
